summary: This is an email exchange from April 12, 2020, between a US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) contractor and an unidentified recipient, discussing whether Ghislaine Maxwell answered any interrogatories in a lawsuit. The response indicates no awareness of such interrogatories.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in an email query about whether she answered interrogatories in a lawsuit.

events.title: Email inquiry about Maxwell interrogatories
events.description: A USANYS contractor emails colleagues asking if Ghislaine Maxwell answered any interrogatories in a lawsuit, with a response indicating no awareness of such answers.

keyFacts: The email is dated April 12, 2020, during the period when Ghislaine Maxwell was under investigation and prior to her arrest in July 2020.
A US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) contractor is inquiring about interrogatories answered by Ghislaine Maxwell in a lawsuit.
The response indicates no awareness of any interrogatories being answered by Maxwell in the referenced lawsuit.
